# File S1: Excel file that includes very less-repetitive benchmark DNA sequences and highly repetitive benchmark RNA sequences for evaluating the suggested algorithm’s performance. (xlsx)
# File S2: Excel file containing compressed files generated by cutting-edge techniques and GraSS on twelve benchmark DNA sequences with very low repetition, arranged according to file size. (xlsx)
# File S3: Excel file containing compressed files of two highly repetitive RNA sequences obtained by GraSS and other benchmark methods ranked by file size. (xlsx)
# File S4: Excel file containing the compression times (S) and decompression times (S) for RNA data sets using the suggested and state-of-the-art methodologies. (xlsx)

# File S5: Excel file with the proposed and cutting-edge algorithms’ human genome (hg) compression time (M). (xlsx)
# File S6: Excel file containing the gain, ratio, and compressed file sizes (MB) of the hg data sets using the state-of-the-art and proposed techniques. (xlsx)
